Name: ASUSTeK Computer
short description: ASUSTeK Computer Inc., usually referred to as ASUS, is a Taiwanese multinational computer hardware and electronics manufacturer.
Founders: M.T. Liao, T.H. Tung, Ted Hsu, Wayne Hsieh
Brief_description: ASUS is a global technology leader in the digital era. It is the world’s top 3 consumer notebook vendor and the maker of the world’s best-selling and most award-winning motherboards.   ASUS is the number one manufacturer of motherboards in the world, commanding almost a 40% market share of the motherboard business. Today, one in every three computers houses an ASUS motherboard. Over 24 million motherboards were sold in 2008. ASUS has a strong presence in over 50 countries around the world, and has offices in Asia, Australia and New Zealand, Europe, the Americas, and South Africa.
